.. _cabd-data-dictionary:

===============
Data Dictionary
===============

.. glossary::

    Database
        cabd

    Tables
        :ref:`dams.dams<dams.dams>`
        
        table2
        
        table3

.. _dams.dams:

``dams.dams``
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Attributes and description for medium dams (i.e., having a height between 5 and 15 m) and large dams (i.e., having height of 15 m or greater, or a height between 5 m and 15 m that impounds more than 3 million m3).

.. csv-table:: 
    :file: tbl/dams-dams.csv
    :widths: 25, 20, 5, 5, 5, 5, 5, 30
    :header-rows: 1

:ref:`Return to top.<cabd-data-dictionary>`
